Verifica la validez de un token JWT

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["api_token"],"properties":{"api_token":{"type":"string","description":"El mismo token que se envía en el header Authorization"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Token válido","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"valid":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"user":{"type":"object"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Token inválido o expirado"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
